name: Landmark Explorer Quiz
desc: Test your knowledge of iconic landmarks from around the world!
author: AI Assistant (chatgpt)

questions.question: Which ancient wonder was located in Egypt and was destroyed by earthquakes?
Which Parisian landmark is famous for its stunning stained glass windows and Gothic architecture?
Which Indian monument is a white marble mausoleum and is considered a symbol of love?
In which city can you find the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue overlooking the harbor?
Which famous landmark is an ancient Incan citadel situated in the Andes Mountains?
What is the name of the massive ancient stone circle located in England?
Which iconic tower in Italy is known for its unintended lean?
Which Chinese landmark is an ancient palace complex that served as the imperial palace for several dynasties?
Which famous opera house is located in Sydney and is characterized by its unique shell-like design?
Which American monument stands in South Dakota and features the faces of four U.S. presidents?
